overview: It's the days before the Grand Opening of the DreamBoy Hotel and the rooms are being taken in a frenzy of handsome faces, skinny twinks and some massive dicks thrown into the mix too! With manager JP and bell boy Skylar checking all these hot boys into their rooms for the night, the welcome packs on the pillows are put to good use with threesomes, spit roasting, cousins fucking and not to mention one of the biggest orgies in DreamBoy history – a total of 7 hung twinks all fucking and sucking together!! Check out who's checking in, and you'll be treated to some damn hot action all within the walls of the DreamBoy Hotel.
tagline: It’s the day before the grand opening of the DreamBoy hotel and all the guests have arrived in their sexiest suits.
title: The DreamBoy Hotel: Grand Opening
